participant_1.background:
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
i am a very tall woman.
I watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

participant_2.background:
I am a software engineer who works remotely, so I can live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown.
i work as an electrician.
I loved spending summers in the country with my cousins and pets.
I used to enjoy playing sports, but my back pain has made it too difficult.
I loved reading books as a child, and I would often spend hours in my room, lost in a world of my imagination.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
Same here. I'm trying to figure out what to do with my day.
What are your interests? Maybe I can help you think of something.
I love to read, write, and play the violin.
Oh, that's great! I used to love to read when I was younger. What's your favorite book?
I have a lot of favorites, but one of my favorites is To Kill a Mockingbird.
That's a great book! I read it in school and really enjoyed it.
Me too. It's such a powerful story.
What do you like to write about?
I love to write short stories and poetry. I'm trying to write a novel, but it's hard to find the time.
I can imagine. Writing is hard work.
Yeah, it is. But it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. Do you play any other instruments?
No, I just play the violin.
That's cool. I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
It's a lot of fun. I've been playing for about 10 years now.
Wow, that's great! I'm sure you're really good at it.
I'm okay. I'm still learning new things all the time.
That's awesome. I hope you keep playing.
